summary: bigpicture log disaster message
description: should be performing data disaster recovery process

if you find this message it means that your database schema for bigpicture plugin was either corrupted or hsql database is used hsql is jira embedded database for trial and development purposes data disaster recovery will fix database schema possibly losing some of bigpicture plugin data
this error does not require you to take any action unless bigpicture plugin for jira work properly
in any case send us an email at
